column5: Her name is Lexi and she is a 7 week old PomChi (Pomeranian / Chihuahua) I lost my other two puppies a year ago in the divorce, so my girlfriend decided to surprise me with a new one yesterday!
they are both Keepers bro
Hahaha, thanks!
Cute little pup you got there Stoty. Congrats
Holy smokes, what a cutie.  Dogs sweet too.
My tenants a few years ago had a PomChi.  Her and my dog where best buds untill the tenants moved out.  There fun little dogs..
My dog looks almost identical, I think mines has some Jack Russel in her to though.
very cute pup, gonna be a habs fan for sure HAHAHA
You could use that for bait out on GBay right about now
I don't appreciate swearing!
Gonna make a great bird dog, eh?
I'd pet it..
Irish go stand in the corner!
congrats on your new baby
Awwwwww, what a cute puppy, congrats to you Stoty.  Joey
Thanks!
Congraduations on the dog!
Have you got a Penguins toque with #87 on it for Lexi yet...or are you gonna settle for a wings toque.  Just kidding.  Puppies are the best pets going. Enjoy your new roomie.
WoW...  A real Sweetheart for sure ...and the little dog is not bad looking either....
Naw....going with a Leafs toque
